Представляю прицел с двач тян, или Алисой Двачевской из БЛ. Есть 2 варинта: для всех и спец прицел для танков с пушкой ф-34, в том числе немецкой Т-34. Шкурка на оны с Дваческой тут https://live.warthunder.com/post/1070936/ru/

#anime

I wanted to make a Bocchi sight. Here is Bocchi sight

There's a colored and default version. Colored is marked with an (_C)

Colored one looks a lot better when looking at the ground or through thermals/nvd

Might end up removing and reuploading if I make the eyes more detailed

#anime #alltanks #all_tanks

Представляю прицел с Хатсунэ Мику из БЛ. Есть варианты для всех танков и вариант реалистичного немецкого прицела для пантеры А. Является неотъемлемым атрибутом Микупантеры. Шкурка на Микупантеру тут: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1067739/ru/

I present a sight with Hatsune Miku from Everlasting summer. There are options for all tanks and the option of a realistic German sight for the Panther A. Is an integral attribute of the Mikupanther. The skin on Mikupanther is here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1067739/ru/

Fictional sight for the Type 16 (P) and the Type 16 FPS.

#type16prototype #type16fps #type16p

Updated and more accurate 3km #sturmtiger optic for long range engagements with drone assistance. Includes 10 meter tick marks. Squad marker aligns with crosshair for indirect firing. I would make the optic longer range, but the drop appears to be nonlinear and unpredictable without using the vanilla optic as a basis. There is also the problem where mouse wheel elevating the gun only goes so far so it is unlikely you could get past 3.4km.

LUCH is discontinued and no longer will be updated.

This sight has the similar functionality:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/1035349/
↵
↵
↵
↵
↵
FIRE CONTROL SYSTEM "LUCH"

Last update 05.04.2023
- Global bug fixed;
- Added armour penetration to almost every possible type of shells.

#eighty_six #anime #86
English -
It's been a while since I saw eighty six and I made it because I saw FelDress of the Federal Republic of Giad. I saw eighty six and found a Juggernaut and a Region sight? I'm going to make that, too.

한국어-
배 타면서 오랜만에 에이티식스를 봤는데 가에데 연방 사관학교에서 신이 주행하는 가에데 연방 장비 조준경을 모티브로 만든겁니다. 에이티식스를 보니깐 저거노트랑 레기온 조준경도 나온게 있더라고요? 그것도 만들어 볼 예정입니다.

Made my first sight, based on realistic.

(Sorry if I used someone else's work)

This is a semi historical sight for the premium T72AV (TURMS-T). The ranges are all fit for the 3BM42 APFSDS and will likely not work with any other round correctly.

NOTE: You may use this sight with other tanks that use the same round for that just put the .blk into the folder for the desired tank. If the folder does not exist you can create it under options > common battle settings > use alternative sight grid > add grid sight

Installation:

  1. Extract the .zip to your UserSights folder in the WarThunder install folder.
  2. Select the desired sight in...

This is a fictional sight for the CV90105 XC-8 and the Patria CT-CV 105HP. The ranges are made only for the DM33 APFSDS. All three color variants are included in the zip.

Edit: To see the different colors you need to use sight illumination.

Updated to include sights for Patria CT-CV 105HP

Installation:

  1. Extract the .zip to your UserSights folder in the WarThunder install folder.
  2. Select the desired sight ingame under options > common battle settings > "use alternative sight grid"

This is a universal sight im tired of waiting for other people making it so i took 20mins of research and made one myself. partially inspired by the laser sight from a challenger sight mod.

you know what, u dont know what them lines are for, i dont know what them lines are for, all my homies hate lines. ok they are probably useful once in a while but most of the time i find them obstructing my sight picture for no good reasons. here, take a simple sight with just the bare minimum. idk if it's been done before but i cant find another one cut to this level of minimalism. hope u find it usef...

#alltanks #anime #animeskin #ayanami #ayanami_rei #rei #evangelion #eva #universal

Pantsir-S1 custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Check up my profile for other custom sights for different vehicles and nations.

#pantsir_s1 #pantsir #bias #ussr #soviet #ru #russian #russianbias #russian_bias #missiles #missile #antiair #antiaircraft #spaa #spaag #tank #sight #customsight #custom

This is a sight for Tiger E and Tiger H with a drawing that shows you the optimal angle you should take when looking at the opponent. Original SketchUp files are included.

A small demonstration of installation and use in the video:

https://youtu.be/SFF7t42QlTM

If you want to learn how to edit this drawing/make your own, visit this link!!
https://live.warthunder.com/post/1000444/en/

Disclaimer: this sight was made for 1920x1080, 16:9 monitors, other monitors might be incompatible with this sight and some deviation in the drawing placement is to be expected in that case.

#sim #si...

There are two types of sights in the folder

  1. NekoW.blk
  2. NekoWzoom.blk


1 file - universal image size
2 file for tanks with a very large zoom
Installation
move the UserSights folder to the game folder.

#neko #anime

Graphical interface for creating custom sights for all tanks for simulator, realistic and arcade battles.

Earlier I made a post https://live.warthunder.com/post/1034369/ on a similar topic, but now I have made a full-fledged window interface for customizing sights.
You have a choice of an executable exe file and original python project (read Installation).
Gaijin does not allow loading the exe into the zip attached to the post, so there is a copy of the project in python.

Updated 18.12
- New vehicles up to War Thunder 2.53
- New sights location support
- Optional...

[DDLC] Monika Sight

"Fire!" (“开炮!”）
Bring Monika into War Thunder reality - and fire with her telling you the range measurement. One step closer to our reality...

Installation: Unzip/extract the files, copy all the .blk files inside the all_tanks folder which is inside the unzipped folder, then paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights > all_tanks .

4 variations for the sight (3 different sizes) are included, check sightinfo.txt for clarification on the naming. The Sketchup file is also included in case you want to edit the sight...
